PRIVATE_CREDENTIAL_SCHEMA.name: Polyseal Private Credential
PRIVATE_CREDENTIAL_SCHEMA.schema: string category,bytes32 merkleRoot,uint64 issuedAt,uint64 expiresAt,string description

PAYMENT_RECEIPT_SCHEMA.name: Polyseal Payment Receipt
PAYMENT_RECEIPT_SCHEMA.schema: address payer,address payee,uint256 amount,address token,string paymentType,bytes32 txHash,uint64 paidAt,string memo

REMITTANCE_PROOF_SCHEMA.name: Polyseal Remittance Proof
REMITTANCE_PROOF_SCHEMA.schema: address sender,address beneficiary,uint256 amount,address token,string corridorCode,bytes32 txHash,uint64 sentAt

PAYROLL_PROOF_SCHEMA.name: Polyseal Payroll Proof
PAYROLL_PROOF_SCHEMA.schema: address employer,address employee,uint256 grossAmount,uint256 netAmount,address token,string period,bytes32 txHash,uint64 paidAt

LOAN_REPAID_SCHEMA.name: Polyseal Loan Repaid
LOAN_REPAID_SCHEMA.schema: address borrower,address lender,uint256 principal,uint256 interest,address token,bytes32 loanId,bytes32 txHash,uint64 repaidAt

LIQUIDITY_PROVIDER_SCHEMA.name: Polyseal Liquidity Provider
LIQUIDITY_PROVIDER_SCHEMA.schema: address provider,address pool,uint256 amount,address token,string action,bytes32 positionId,uint64 timestamp

DEFI_SCORE_SCHEMA.name: Polyseal DeFi Score
DEFI_SCORE_SCHEMA.schema: address subject,uint256 score,uint64 calculatedAt,uint256 totalLoans,uint256 totalVolume,uint256 liquidations,string methodologyVersion
